channel.title: RUN35C4P3 stats F**k
channel.description:
Yes, I know, the title is stupid and misleading, but I thought it contributed to the topic. Anyways, I was surfing the internet (which I do lots of times when I'm bored) and I came across this little funny topic. It involves a bunch of little kids trying to hack peoples accounts with these so called Stat editors, it's only about 9 or 10 posts, but I got a small laugh out of it. It's funny because none of us would ever fall for something so stupid as any of that. And when people do, how stupid they are to actually buy in to that crap. Anyways, I'll quit and show y'all the link.
http://forums.rpghost.com/showthread.php?p=709732#post709732

item.title: RUN35C4P3 stats F**k
item.dc:creator: @mopar_rox mopar rox
item.description:
@mopar_rox wrote:

What a pathetic attempt eh? You clearly see every one of them has 1-5 posts. And no other members had more than that amount. They created a free forum and realy put no effort into the scam. Most people post fake bank account pictures and fake stats, as much as I want to cut them, they atleast gave a half assed attempt. These guys didn’t do shit.

item.title: RUN35C4P3 stats F**k
item.dc:creator: @Kulkka Kulkka
item.description:
@Kulkka wrote:

All I can say is…Lmao.Look at this post:

hi im a former jagex staff that got sacked for hacking but they did not repair the problems so i can still change stats and items so folow this guide send an email to:jagexadmin099@hotmail.co.uk and put thesubject as "help"then send an email thatgoes something likethis...

Hi, myname is _______ andi recently got hacked playingyour game runescape. I did not have any controlover it but lost thefollowing items.(list items uneed) ______ ______________ _______ and . Ineed them back asap. If you would transfer them tomy account,(ur acc.) the password is____(ur pass) Andmy bank pin is_____( ur bankpin). Thank you somuch jagex member 099,

thank you,
your valient user ______(uracc.)

ok here are some guidelinesyou HAVE tofollow when using this.

  1. DONTUSE MORE THAN TWICE A WEEK!!!
    2.DONT MAKETHE EMAIL CHEESY!!!
  2. DONT ASKFOR BRONZECUZ ITS A WAISTE !!! (lol) jk

havefun but dont spoil it ;p

by the way dont trust links to stat editors or item dupes becase they are full of virusis a.k.a troujens key loggers


Nice grammar he got there.
Check this out too:
dear all runescape players, have you ever seen a lvl 126 player and wondered how in the hell they got that high? well it was hard work, but for all you lazy people out there, and you know who you are. ive found a stat editor first used by andrew and paul(the creators of runescape) about 1 year ago. they deleted it on all computers except the one that i have. this hack doesnt involve going through firewalls attempting to “beat the system”. i have the program installed on my computer and my runescape account is level 126 combat, but not all lvls are 99 so jagex wont know.forther more if u whould like this cheat plez send your pass and user name to fellowship7777@aol.com if u do not beleve me plz fell free to try this on a noob and for all u who do not beleve me the program is called editer v0.1 and i am selling it to for 100k or i will do it free for u happie pk!in god yours cheat master
Seemingly everybody trying to scam in that topic.Morons.

im glad you decide to post this? this is technically pass scammin… because your giving a link to something that is a keylogger… so why post it
just copy and paste it and use quotes and take the link out. way safer

your safe as long as your not a retard
[/quote]
